Html:
Is there a way to avoid the author filed being split-up into first name, second name, not generally, but  in individual cases (ASA style)? For instance, I would like

World Health Organization

to stay as it is, and not being transformed to

Organization, World Health

The easiest way is to use the corporate field.

As an alternative, you might want to try using non-breaking spaces rather than normal spaces, but those are hard to insert, and I'm not certain they will give the proper result.

Note that the behaviour you are experiencing is actually a bug in Word 2007/2008 (and partially in 2010). For more information on this bug, as well as a fix, see http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/27834
The corporate field did the job... Thanks!
